attributes.action: Bring true democracy to the U.K.
attributes.additional_details:
It is about time true democacy was introduced to the U.K.
Democracy is not choosing which plutocratic party runs the country on behalf of corporations, but the people choosing the laws and policies they want to see in their society.
Anyone with an interest should get a say in every matter that influences their life, not just which political party uses oppressive laws to benefit themselves and their corporate friends.
With the current government openly supporting fascism, fraud, censorship and illegal wars it is time to take control of our own future, otherwise times will get harder, more oppressive and before long it will be too late.
With the use of the internet and the digital passport number, a system could easily be created to identify and give each person a vote onthe matter's that affect them. Once the vote is in, the matter is decided by the majority count.
It is time to take your life into your own hands.
